description.value: This extension is used to augment a reference with the target resource category, in cases when Reference.type is not precise enough to determine the functional counterpart of the reference. The value of this extension is often a semantic code (e.g. the zib's root definition code) identifies the target resource category.

definition.value:
The expected resource category of the target of the reference.
The ResourceCategory is a semantic code that represents the category of the resource this reference refers to.

comment.value: This element is used to indicate the resource's category of the target of the reference in cases when the Reference.type is not precise enough to determine the functional counterpart of the reference element.
